trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The girallon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The girallon makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit. reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.
